p: Basic knowledge of modes of transmission, prevention strategies, signs and symptoms, and possible neurologic consequences for the fetus need to be maintained and expanded not only for pregnant women but also for women of reproductive age and their partners; taking advantage of the media as the main source of information recognized in the study should be considered.
